ing.item: Bananas; As many bananas as there are guests

directions.step:
From: elisa@netcom.com (Elisa Enison)
Date: Thu, 11 Jul 1996 12:50:19 -0700 Place bananas (IN PEEL) on aluminum foil covered baking sheet bake for 20-30 minutes @ 350 degrees or until peel becomes black. Remove from skin and place in dish. Top with a dollop of whipped topping.
This is especially good if the bananas are ripe. Bananas come out almost tasting as if liquer has been added.
